snippet: In another example of the harm caused by the Supreme Court ruling on campaign spending, a super PAC in North Carolina aims to influence a judicial election.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the North Carolina Judicial Coalition, a new super PAC that is determined to make the race for a seat on the North Carolina Supreme Court ideological and expensive, offers another example of the harm caused by the Citizens United Supreme Court ruling on campaign spending.
lead_paragraph: In another example of the harm caused by the Supreme Court ruling on campaign spending, a super PAC in North Carolina aims to influence a judicial election.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
